name: The Texas Chainsaw Massacre - The Game
name_original: The Texas Chainsaw Massacre - The Game
description:
penetrate the house to find and rescue a girl kidnapped by Leatherface. Be apprehensive for your life! Demonstrate courage and inventiveness in this game. Leatherface kidnapped a girl and locked her in his house. You must rescue a poor girl before he kills her. For this you must penetrate a scary house of Leatherface. Carefully examine the rooms, basement and other premises. Find evidence and clues. Get useful objects. However, you need to remember that Leatherface can hear your steps.

Game features:

* Exciting plot

* Gloomy house

* Insane killer

* Hard puzzles

* Hidden object scenes

* High quality graphics and sound

Check out the First Game:

https://sussy-amogus-sus.itch.io/hackie-deep-web-horror-game
